title: Frequently Asked Questions
answer_1: Instead of a fixed monthly premium, you pay based on how much you actually drive.
answer_2: Ideal for occasional drivers, remote workers, retirees, students, and those with multiple cars.
answer_3: You pay a base fee plus a per-mile rate. Example: 20₾ base + 0.05₾ per mile.
answer_4: Mileage is tracked via smartphone GPS, OBD-II devices, or connected car APIs.
answer_5: Payments are processed daily, weekly, or monthly through credit card, crypto, or PayPal.
answer_6: Yes! Earn points for safe driving, participate in leaderboards, and get discounts.
